item.description: Catch up with some old friends and new. The Brewery has a new look and the menu is very reasonable. Come have something to eat or an appetizer and a beer. It's been a long time since we just sat around to laugh and chat. $2 Miller Lite 16oz Draughts and the Pool is FREE on Tuesdays. Spinners are scheduled for an away game that nite so there should be plenty of free parking as well.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Burgers and Brews + Free Pool
